targets.query: SELECT LAST("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS(SLC)", LAST("QUEUE_RATE_SLC") AS "Queue Rate(SLC)"  FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *

SELECT LAST("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS(SLC)", LAST("QUEUE_RATE_SLC") AS "Queue Rate(SLC)", LAST("CURRENT_DROP_COUNT") AS "Queue Drop Count", LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput", LAST("DESTINATION_CACHE") AS "Destination Cache" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *

SELECT LAST("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS(SLC)", LAST("QUEUE_RATE_SLC") AS "Queue Rate(SLC)", LAST("CURRENT_DROP_COUNT") AS "Queue Drop Count", LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput", LAST("DESTINATION_CACHE") AS "Destination Cache" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_CACHE") AS "Destination Cache" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *

SELECT LAST("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS(SLC)", LAST("QUEUE_RATE_SLC") AS "Queue Rate(SLC)", LAST("CURRENT_DROP_COUNT") AS "Queue Drop Count", LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput", LAST("DESTINATION_CACHE") AS "Destination Cache" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *

targets.alias: Process Name: $tag_process_name  -- PID $tag_pid -- PID File: $tag_pidfile  --  User: $tag_user
targets.query: SELECT LAST("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), pid, pidfile, *
SELECT LAST(total) FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter)

targets.alias: Process Name: $tag_process_name -- PID: $tag_pid -- PID File: $tag_pidfile -- User: $tag_user
targets.query: SELECT LAST("memory_rss") FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

targets.alias: Process Name: $tag_process_name -- PID: $tag_pid  -- PID File: $tag_pidfile -- User: $tag_user
targets.query: SELECT LAST("num_threads") FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/)AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT LAST("CURRENT_DROP_COUNT") AS "Queue Drop Count" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), AGENT_NAME, *

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT ( MEAN(load1) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_1, ( MEAN(load5) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_5, ( MEAN(load15) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s) * count("bytes_recv") / count("bytes_recv") * 8 as "Inbound"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s) * count("bytes_sent") / count("bytes_sent") * 8 as "Outbound" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "path" fill(none)
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host", "path"
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean(usage_system) + mean(usage_iowait) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$connector_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT LAST("AGENT_TYPE") AS "Agent Type", LAST("AGENT_VERSION") AS "Agent Version", LAST("PARSER_AUP_VERSION") AS "Parser AUP Version", LAST("PORT") AS "Port", LAST("PROTOCOL") AS "Protocol", LAST("IP_ADDRESS") AS "IP Address", LAST("FORWARDER") AS "Forwarder", LAST("FIPS_ENABLED") AS "FIPS Enabled" FROM "Z_Con_1" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter)

SELECT LAST("COMMAND_RESPONSES_PROCESSED") AS "Commands Processed", LAST("EVENTS_FILTERED_OUT") AS "Events Filtered Out", LAST("EVENTS_FILTER_STATE") AS "Events Filter State", LAST("EVENTS_PROCESSED") AS "Events Processed", LAST("TRACKING_DEVICE_COUNT") AS "Tracking Device Count", LAST("TRACKING_EVENT_COUNT") AS "Tracking Event Count", LAST("TRACKING_EVENT_SIZE") AS "Tracking Event Size" FROM "Z_Con_1" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$connector_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Connector
list.name: connector_m
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m/
list.label: Disks
list.name: disks
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/
list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/
list.label: NIC
list.name: nic
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$connector_m$/
